summary: All three requested frontend requirements (App Link area with copy+fallback, troubleshooting panel referencing the exact error text and steps, and derived slug note) appear to be implemented via new components and a slugify utility, then composed into App.tsx. One additional footer attribution/link (caffeine.ai referral) was added that is not part of the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Footer includes an external attribution/referral link to caffeine.ai (with UTM parameters) and additional footer copy beyond the requested slug note.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked to surface the derived slug in a small admin/developer note; it did not request adding third-party attribution/referral links or related footer content.
